message.body: I'm not :( needed some rest and have to get organized before the week starts!
Bummer... :( I may come to NYC Saturday night...? How would that work for you?
That would be awesome!! My parents are here and we are going to a show but we can either do dinner or get together after - yipeeeee!
Oh right! Well I don't want to impose... I'll let you know
No no - it would be fun!!!
